betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§o这里有所有匠魂属性的描述；

异形
感觉有些不对劲……好像它们在变化！也许时间会告诉我们答案？

防空 I-II
对飞行实体造成额外伤害。

抗腐蚀
每tick都有概率移除中毒效果（持握时）。

启示录
你的受害者将会变得奄奄一息，并且会受到越来越强的凋零效果的折磨。

喜水
水下的挖掘速度将不会受到影响，在雨天也会得到增强。

好暑
环境越热，工具越顺手。

自动冶炼
自动烧炼采掘下来的方块。

美味培根
使用工具时将有几率得到培根。

爵士
概率造成额外伤害。

炽热
点燃目标。

盲匪
当你攻击或被攻击时，有时会召唤出一个只持续一定时间的“盲匪”。它会攻击敌对生物以及敢攻击它的人（除了你），造成穿透伤害。

凛冰 II
冻结敌人15秒，向敌人施加缓慢效果并附加龙霜伤害。

嗜血
击杀生物时，为灵魂网络增加生命源质。

肉体
Higher Durability

骨头休克
Deals additional damage to non-arthropod creatures.

植物学 I-II
Increases the amount of slots; the effect stacks greatly.

育母蜂
Spawn a Vespa larva during combat or when a block is harvested.

布朗魔术
Press the "set portal" key (default "N") to set a virtual portal on the block you are pointing at. By default, press "Y" to teleport there (if there is enough space).

现充**
Enemies struck by this weapon have thunderbolts rained down on them.

廉价
Increases durability gained when repairing the tool.

吝啬
Your tool has less durability.

灵魂
Makes your tool or weapon drop Mob Chunks.

冷血
Deal increased damage to targets at full health.

珊瑚疫染
Apply the Coralium Plague on critical hits.

配重 I-II
Increases tool efficiency when not touching the ground.

暴击伤害
Always do a critical hit!

粗暴 I-II
Bonus damage against unarmored targets.

坍毁
The tool breaks soft blocks that don't need a tool faster.

暗黑行者
Surrounding mobs get randomly afflicted with damage.

黑暗
Dark influences don't wont on your enemy, so they're tortured instead!

意志坚定
When attacking or defending, Supreme Leaders will spawn, exploding on opponents in the same manner as a creeper.

致密
Your tool lasts longer when it has less durability.

恶魔之力
Bonus damage to non-Overworld mobs.

存入
Teleports mined things directly into your inventory.

折扣
Significantly increases durability gained when repairing the tool.

恐惧疫染
Apply the Dread Plague on critical hits.

持久
Your tool lasts longer ...most of the time.

生态
Renewable resources are so good, they regenerate by themselves!

元素
When gravity-affected blocks are destroyed, break all blocks of the same type above and below. Also, a chance to gain various benefits from a sucessful attack.

抑影
Prevents Endermen from teleporting around for a short time.

折跃
Projectiles instantly travel to their destination.

电老虎
Boosts the mining speed and damage by consuming energy!

能量修复
Repairs from the energy stored in the inventory, but only when it's about to be damaged...

空灵矿工
Mining blocks prevents blocks above falling down.

厄运光环
When held, creates an aura of evil that brings misfortune to the wielder.

邪恶的压力
Each hit has a chance to amplify negative effects present on mob.

经验提升
Gives bonus XP when mining or slaying mobs.

饥荒
Gives Hunger. Restore 1 hunger points when hitting a non-undead entity or harvesting a block. 

烈焰之怒
Deals additional damage while on fire.

可燃
Blocking blocks fire damage and getting hit sets the attacker on fire.

碎骨 I-II
Your tools damage is increased.

霜冻
Successful hits slow your target more and more.

水果沙拉
A tool with this trait can store up to 5 types of fruits.

恐怖
If the holder is attacked while sneaking, the attacker is inflicted with Slowness.

故障
Drops Glitch Heart sometimes when killing.

环球旅行者
Shift-right-click a block in order for items from broken blocks and killed entities to get transported in there if it is an inventory.

荧光
Whenever it gets too dark your tool sacrifices a part of itself to light up your way.

九头蛇万岁
Random explosions plague your enemies. Also, when you are attacked, there is a chance to get Absorption.

佚名
Bonus damage accrued for each entity of the same type as the target close to it.

治愈
Guess you like the enemy so much you heal them every time you try to hurt them

沉重
Prevents knockback.

炼狱
Deal bonus damage to non-Nether mobs.

高钙
Drops bones and bonemeal while breaking blocks.

巢穴卫士
Deals +8 extra damage against death worms and +4 damage against non-arthropods.

神圣
Deal bonus damage to undead enemies.

光照派
While the tool is in your hand, nearby entities (that do not hold a tool with this trait) glow, and you become invisible.

我是超级巨星
Effects depend on the player's attunement.

炼狱之力
Massively increases tool efficiency when on fire.

炽火 II
Sets enemies on fire for 15 seconds with added knockbacks, and deals additional dragon flame damage.

贪心
During combat you deal more and more damage but also consume more and more durability.

Instakill
One-shot kills. Slightly dangerous

In the Garage
Extra damage in the shadow


筋疲力尽
Mobs attacked with this tool have their ability to heal temporarily hindered.

锯齿
Every point durability lost increases damage.

掺和
Poisons creatures when hit.

发射
Occasionally make your enemy go flying. They like it...until they hit the ground

轻便
Increases the overall speed of your tool when mining and attacking.

反哺 I-II
Heals itself via the user's Soul Network

魔法易碎
Has a random chance of breaking when it takes damage. Can break 'unbreakable' tools.

魔法强化
Adds 3 extra modifiers to a tool

磁力 I-II
Hitting things attracts nearby things?!

魔力
魔力 can be used in place of durability, and can heal the tool over time.

魔力吞噬
Boosts the mining speed and damage by consuming mana!

魔力修复
Repairs from the mana stored in the player, but only when it's about to be damaged...

精神
More Effecient

光怪陆离
Occasionally, a gold or diamond ore will appear in stone immediately surrounding you (at the cost of durability).

可铸模
Blend additional modifiers into your tool.

动力
Mining blocks increases your speed, as long as you keep going.

摩根勒菲
Bonus magic damage (ranging from 0.0 to 5.0; Gaussian distributed) is afflicted (it is absolute).

球体音乐
The tool doubles as a movable boombox.

自然祝福
A chance to drop bread per mob killed or block broken. Sometimes heals the player by a bit after killing a mob.

自然之力
After attacking a mob: 20% chance to burn target. 20% chance to give player Speed. 20% chance to give player Strength.

自然之怒
After attacking a mob, there is a chance to burn the target, as well as to heal the player.

溢出
There is a 25% probability that this weapon directly wipes off half of target's health each attack.

以牙还牙
Become enraged and deal moar damage when severely injured

爱石
Your tool loves stone, it literally wants to absorb it (for durability).

剧毒
Poisons enemies on hit.

憨厚的绅士
Shift-right-click an entity to capture it (costs durability based on entity health). Press the "release entity" key (default "0") in order to release it.

太阳能
Torch works too. Mining and Fighting are effected by your light conditions

积淀
The less health you have, the speedier it is!

尖刺
Nobody is safe from those thorns, they always hurt.

活化
Makes your tool or weapon randomly drop Prosperity Shards.

Psi吞噬
Boosts the mining speed and damage by consuming psi!

Psi修复
Repairs from the psi stored in the player, but only when it's about to be damaged...

净化
Deal 25% extra damage to any Dread-Plagued entity.

辐射 I-III
Randomly causes hunger or radiation poisoning :(

反射
Why are you hitting yourself

惊醒
Damage pierces armor (mobs only).

符文 I-II
Converts a portion of damage dealt into magic damage.

暗影
Uses Mana to repair, can also  summon dark pixies when you attack mobs.

锐利
Hitting an enemy leaves them bleeding for a short time.

雷震
Occasionally shock your enemy with a bolt of thunder. Or lightning. Whatever

震击
Running around, breaking blocks or hitting things charges your tool. Hitting an enemy discharges it, dealing damage and providing a speed boost. Mining a block discharges it, giving a mining speed boost.

塞尔瑞风格
Prevents the tool from taking damage when in direct sunlight.

斩击
Critical hits gain 20% more damage!

黏滑
It'll wash off.

弹弓
Your tool become a slingshot for you to use for others!

救命！
Recover when severely injured at a large cost

灵魂
Extra 3 Modifiers

灵魂萃取
Regenerates soul power while mining.

灵魂血液
Regenerates soul power based on damage dealt.

黑桃
The lower your health, the more damage you do.

棘刺
Blocking and getting hurt deals damage to the attacker.

碎裂 I-II
Hit them more to deal more damage.

碎裂
Be careful not to catch a splinter!

柔和
Your tool is so soft and squeaky it gained silktouch, but deals no damage.

坚毅
Hitting an entity can make you feel emboldened.

海星
Press the "set portal" key (default "N") to set a virtual portal on the block you are pointing at. If you are on the brink of death, you have %d enori crystals to spare, and the portal has enough space above, then the crystals are consumed, you are teleported to the virtual portal, and you are spared. (The tool must be in your hand.)

坚忍
Blocking reduces the damage taken even more.

石缚
The tool mines faster as it wears out, but does less damage.

勿要自私
More damage is added the closer other players are to the attacker.

过热
Deal bonus damage to enemies on fire.

Surf Wax America
Extra damage while mounting

同调
Will repair itself if you have Steeleaves in your hotbar.

美味
Smells so good.. You'd rather eat your tool than starve.

坚实基础
While this tool is in your hand (or this armor is worn), you will heal over time.

神秘
A tool with this gains 1 extra slot, or 2 extra slots if either at least 3 parts have this trait, or the tool is made entirely out of parts with this trait.

热力反转
Hitting an enemy in a hot or cold environment will chill or burn them.

Toxic
Releases a toxic cloud when critically-hitting enemies

啾啾
Ever wanted to sound like a charger?

暮光
More damage outside the Twilight Forest.

Undone
Critical hits remove armor

不洁之触
Deals bonus damage to non-undead entity and applies Weakness 

超自然
The tool mines faster the higher its mining level is above the required one.

振奋
Occasionally regenerates health on use.

传送 I-III
Chance to teleport enemies away.

污秽
Adds an additional soul per kill to your Soul Shard

报复
Bonus damage to players, and you gain some health by attacking.

Weeee!
Powerful enough to destroy everything below it! At least...harvest level-wise.

老成
You gain additional XP.

细语
Will occasionally whisper it's will to you

凋零
Withers enemies on hit.

铭刻
More words. More Modifiers. It's only logical!
